page.title: 18BLACKO VILLAGE POLICEMAN
page.content: We interviewed our Village Policeman about his job, his name is{Police {Constable Michael Duerden.}His base is Nelson Police Station and he is in G Division. He patrols{Blacko, Barley, {Roughlee and Newchurch.}He has to carry a two way radio with him which is called a{Walkie Talkie.}He has to carry this with him even when he isn't in uniform. Mr. Duerden comes to Blacko four times a week usually for four hours each day. The crimes in rural areas are very different to those in towns. He says that compared to the big towns of Nelson and Burnley there is very little vandalism in our block. He has to deal with crimes like sheep stealing and poaching. He said that his worst job was when he had to shoot a stray bull in Barrowford.He enjoys his job very much.
